name: Hentai Neon Nights
description:
This is a simple but fascinating puzzle game with different levels of difficulty and unlockable girls as you gain points. Score points, set records and enjoy the game!

Game Features:
*A fun and easy-to-learn gameplay. You only need one hand to play. You can control both with arrows and mouse drag;
*Record system. Beat your own and improve your score;
*Lots of hentai style pictures/levels;
*Multiple difficulty levels;
